pkgmetadata.longdescription: # BgmiGet## How to Install```pip install bgmiget```## Basic UsageSearch anime by "search" commnad.```bgmiget search '因为太怕痛' 7 "sc" "桜都字幕组">0 -> 【因为太怕痛...】【07】【桜都字幕组】```Then, download anime by index.```bgmiget download 0```Subscribe anime by "subscribe" command, and list them by "show_subscribed" command.At last, check for updates on anime by "upgrade" command.
